text: @CNN WTF? CNN? FACTS PLEASE! 🙄You’re story is lacking facts, it’s all speculation! Pfft. Sad to hear he passed...Was it coronavirus that took his life? Please confirm that “said woman” actually had coronavirus or was it a cough associated with allergies, bronchitis, smokers cough...
